description: Try our easy to follow Honey & Ginger Drumsticks with Mango & Cucumber Salsa recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken drumsticks,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Rice,Egg free,Mango,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Honey & Ginger Drumsticks with Mango & Cucumber Salsa Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cups medium grain white rice (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line a large ovenproof dish with baking paper.

Combine honey, orange juice, kecap manis, ginger and garlic in a bowl. Season with salt and pepper. Put drumsticks into prepared dish. Pour marinade over chicken, turning to coat. Cover and refrigerate for 30 minutes.
To make salad, combine mango, cucumber, onion, coriander and lime juice in a large bowl.
Bake drumsticks for 4045 minutes or until cooked through and golden. Serve drumstick with salad and rice.
